title: Harry Potter: Wizards Unite Launch Sales - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.24.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/GAMES now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Boost is only available at http://Experian.com/KFGAMES

It's Frandrea Monday at KFGD and Fran and Andrea are chatting about the success of the GuardianCon St. Jude charity stream, Bungie's decisions to delay Destiny 2 fixes to preserve "work-life balance," Harry Potter: Wizards Unite successful launch, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:01:52 - Housekeeping
It’s the project you’ve been waiting 1 year for. SUNDAY, the video version of Kinda Funny Prom goes live on youtube.com/kindafunny. Come see Smash Mouth shock the world, Greg marry two Kinda Funny Best Friends, and Tim and Gia crowd surf. Subscribe now!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:05 - Streamer Raises Almost $1 Million For Charity In Just Four Hours - via Kotaku, Luke Plunkett
00:07:55 - Sony Patents Target Reduced Load Times By Matt Purslow (IGN)
00:15:48 - Bungie postpones Destiny 2 fixes to "preserve work-life balance" of team - via Eurogamer, Vikki Blake
00:21:32 - Harry Potter: Wizards Unite Generates $300,000 In 24 Hours - Eddie Makuch, Gamespot
00:28:00 - Out today
00:31:49 -  Thirdlove
00:33:10 - Experian
Reader mail   -
00:35:44 - Eyebrows - Joebeezer
00:36:40 - I'm wondering how you all feel about the balance between live service games offering content at launch versus post-launch. - CJ Schummer
00:40:00 - What games would YOU like see released again in a physical edition to ensure it isn't lost in the digital revolution? - Michael Gulliver
00:49:40 - What game would you love to see a documentary on, and why? - Eduardo (Game-GO)
00:55:43 - You‘re Wrong
This week’s host:
TUESDAY: Greg and Andrea
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Andrea
FRIDAY: Greg and Tim
